attributes.action: make people who are unemployed on job seekers benefit for over a year not looking for work do community work to continue to recieve benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who have been out of work and not actively seek any for over a year,to have to undertake community work in  order to continue to recieve benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
